settings.title: A Neuyguycuyv Wave of Nutrition
settings.text:
When it comes to nutrition, we’re committed to doing things the right way.

This means challenging the status quo by upholding high-quality integrity within our brand and our products.

We stand behind NEUBRAIN™ as the cleanest brain and body supplement ever developed.

settings.title: Premium Ingredients
settings.text: NeuBrain starts with fresh, premium-quality ingredients sourced from leading global suppliers. 100% of our ingredients are sourced sustainably and ethically.

settings.title:
real mushrooms.
No grain fillers.
settings.text:
Why does NEUBRAIN™ use double-extracted, 100% fruiting body mushrooms? 

Imagine our surprise when we found out most mushroom-based supplements are selling filler. These companies grow their mushrooms on substrates like oats, rice, or grain, blend everything together, and label it as a 'mushroom.' Beware of supplements with 'mycelial biomass' mushrooms – they're not the premium quality you deserve!

NEUBRAIN™ is committed to providing only the best. We use 100% fruiting body mushrooms. No rice, oats, or grain. These compounds undergo a double-extraction process to guarantee each serving delivers the highest quality beta-glucans, triterpenes, and triterpenoids.

settings.title: Backed By Science
settings.text:
All 10 ingredients in our formula are research-backed and clinically dosed, for both safety and effectiveness.

NEUBRAIN™ is the world's smartest coffee, with a clean formulation that works to enhance brain and body performance.

Helping you to work, play, live, and age smarter, NEUBRAIN™ is a smarter coffee for a smarter you.

We search the globe to find the best ingredients on earth, which undergo a strict qualification program before entering our supply chain. We ensure that 100% of our ingredients are sourced sustainably and ethically.

We stand behind our sourcing to ensure NEUBRAIN™ is the most effective, delicious, and sustainable nootropic supplement on the market.

settings.title: Quality Assurance
settings.text:
Incoming ingredients are quarantined and tested prior to entering our manufacturing facilities.

This step ensures NEUBRAIN™ ingredients contain optimal levels of nootropics and contain no contaminates such as heavy metals, allergens, GMOs, microbes, pesticides, and more.

settings.title: Quality Control
settings.text:
Finished batches of NEUBRAIN™ are re-tested in accordance with AQL standards to confirm potency, purity, and effectiveness.

Finished pouches also undergo seal testing to ensure no contaminates will enter the bag when shipped to your door.

settings.title: Third Party Validation
settings.text:
After manufacturing is complete, finished batches of NEUBRAIN™ are third-party tested to validate purity and potency. Batches are tested for label accuracy to make sure each serving contains the correct ingredients, and purity testing to ensure no heavy metals, allergens, GMOs, microbes, or pesticides are present. 

Testing is conducted with a state-of-the-art, ISO 17025-accredited, DEA-licensed, and FDA-registered laboratory in Utah.

We take these extra steps to ensure what we advertise 100% matches the product you receive.

NeuBrain is made in FDA-registered, GMP-compliant facilities to ensure the manufacturing practices are best in class. 

NeuBrain is formulated and blended in the United States.

settings.title: Planet Friendly
settings.text: NeuBrain ships in 100% recyclable packaging. NeuBrain’s pouch is made from post-consumer recycled (PCR) materials and is certified by the Forest Sustainability Council (FSC) as a low-impact item against forests worldwide.

settings.title: NEUBRAIN’S PROMISE
settings.text:
We pledge to provide you with clinically measured supplements, crafted from tested, raw, and potent ingredients, free from preservatives, artificial flavors, unneeded fillers, banned substances, or GMOs.

Our products are scientifically formulated, relying on clinical trials to ensure each ingredient serves a precise purpose. You can expect them to work exactly as they say. You should expect results, and we are here to provide them.

If you are not entirely satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows for a refund or exchange within 45 days from the shipping date. Your satisfaction is always our paramount concern.

settings.question: What is NeuBrain?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ is a matrix of 10 scientifically supported nootropics, adaptogens, and prebiotics. It's designed as a superior alternative to traditional coffee, aiming to optimize your brain and body performance.

Considered the world's smartest coffee, NEUBRAIN™ acts as a comprehensive optimizer for your brain and body, offering support for immediate cognitive function and long-term health.

settings.question: How does NeuBrain work?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ stands apart from other nootropics and coffee alternatives due to its advanced formulation strategy. It exclusively uses research-backed nootropics, adaptogens, and prebiotics that support nine crucial brand and body pathways: Energy, Brain Chemicals, Blood Flow, Brainwaves, Neuroprotection, Neuroregeneration, Immune System, Nervous System, and Digestive System.

By delivering enhanced forms of these ingredients at clinical range dosages, NEUBRIAN™ functions as a 'smart supplement,' designed to unlock your peak performance.

settings.question: What does NeuBrain feel like?
settings.answer:
Unlike conventional supplements that tend to focus only on one or two aspects of brain and body performance, NEUBRAIN™ is a comprehensive optimizer for your entire brain and body. It's formulated to foster an adaptive state of peak performance.

The benefits of NEUBRAIN™ are versatile: In the workspace, it could enhance your multitasking abilities or single-task focus.

When exercising, it may fuel your motivation and drive.

When preparing for an outdoor adventure, it can boost your energy levels to face any challenges ahead.

For learners, it may improve studying capacity and bring calm, clear focus during exams.

In social situations, NEUBRAIN™ may promote relaxation, a brighter mood, and fluid communication skills.

settings.question: What does NeuBrain taste like?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ was developed to become your new morning ritual, a refreshing alternative to your regular coffee.

We've crafted a medium roast blend with hints of cocoa to not only tantalize your taste buds but also fill your kitchen with a delightful aroma.

NEUBRAIN™ is easy to prepare and provides you with enduring energy throughout the day, minus the jitters, anxiety, or afternoon coffee often associated with regular coffee.
